message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  I really appreciate it, but $120 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $80. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $100. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let me know what you think.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $100, but I'm still not quite there. My budget is very tight, and I can only offer $85. This is my final offer, let me know if you're willing to take it.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $85. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $95. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let me know what you think.
Alice, I understand your position, but $95 is still out of my price range. I'm willing to go up to $90, but that's my absolute limit.  Let's try to make this work.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $90. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $98. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let me know what you think.
